mapper.insert: insert into bank_card (id, bank_code, card_number, created_time, status, login_name, is_fast_pay_on) value(#{id}, #{bankCode}, #{cardNumber}, #{createdTime}, #{status}, #{loginName}, #{isFastPayOn})
mapper.select: select * from bank_card where login_name = #{loginName} and status = 'PASSED'
select * from bank_card where bank_code = #{bankCode} and status = 'PASSED'
select * from bank_card where login_name = #{loginName} and status = 'PASSED' and is_fast_pay_on = true
mapper.update: update bank_card set bank_code = #{bankCode}, card_number = #{cardNumber}, status = #{status}, login_name = #{loginName}, is_fast_pay_on = #{isFastPayOn} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from bank_card where login_name = #{loginName} and status = 'APPLY' and is_fast_pay_on = true
